section.name: Accounting of property deprecation.
section.p:
Bob bought Ford on Jan. 12 2016 for 22000USD. He has made accounting entries:
So first trial balance as at Jan.12 2016 is:
He should use MACRS method for it deprecation according to IRS Publication 946. This is listed property used 100% for business purpose, so he elected GDS (General Depreciation System). This is 5­year property. He elected 200% declining balance method (DL). He should use half-year convention (HY), so he uses Table A-1. According this table deprecation is 20% for the first year i.e. 4400USD is deducting Bob's 2016 Income Tax. So 31 December 2016 Bob's will transfer 4400USD from asset account Property into income (business) expense account 5150 Expenses.Property Deprecation:
